text: Hana, it's about this weekend's lesson──

Haruki's schedule hasn't changed,
so it's become a joint lesson with Haruki.

Thank you so much,
Producer-san, you're so kind!

Hehe, a lesson with Haruki-chanー
I feel like I can really do my best...!

What kind of lessons does
Luca Ikaruga usually have?

Yeah, she's a senior in solo activities,
so it might be educational.

............
Yeah, let's try to observe when our schedules align.

──Oh, but if our levels are too different,
what if I get shocked?

......If that happens,
I'll figure something out.
Huh, so there's a big possibility of that...!?

............But
I'll count on you if that happens.

Haha, sorry, sorry...! It'll be fine.
Surely, there's a lot to learn from Luca.
